code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{faSearch}from"@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons";import{FontAwesomeIcon}from"@fortawesome/react-fontawesome";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchForm=_ref=>{let{data,searchByData,setFilteredData,setSearching}=_ref;const[search,setSearch]=useState('');const[,setSearchFor]=useState('');const[searchBy,setSearchBy]=useState(searchByData&&searchByData.length>0?searchByData[0].value:'');const submitHandler=event=>{event.preventDefault();if(search.trim()!==''){setSearching(true);const copiedData=[...data];const filtered=copiedData.filter(perfumer=>{let searchKey='perfumer';if(searchByData&&searchByData.length>0){searchKey=searchBy;}return perfumer[searchKey].toLowerCase().includes(search.trim().toLowerCase());});setFilteredData(filtered);}else{setFilteredData(data);}setSearchFor(search);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{onSubmit:submitHandler,style:{justifyContent:'center'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[searchByData&&searchByData.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-sm-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{className:"form-control",value:searchBy,onChange:event=>setSearchBy(event.target.value),children:searchByData.map((data,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:data.value,children:data.label},index))})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",placeholder:"Search...",value:search,onChange:event=>setSearch(event.target.value)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-dark",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faSearch})," Search"]})]})});};export default SearchForm;
